citation: Proclamation under the Water and Sewerage Industry (Consequential and Transitional) Act 2008 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Water and Sewerage Industry (Consequential and Transitional) Act 2008

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Water and Sewerage Industry (Consequential and Transitional) Act 2008 â€“

        (a) fix 16 June 2009 as the day on which section 3 of, and Schedule 1 to, the Water and Sewerage Industry (Consequential and Transitional) Act 2008 commence; and
        (b) fix 16 June 2009 as the day on which the provisions of Schedule 1 to the Water and Sewerage Industry (Consequential and Transitional) Act 2008 that insert, amend, repeal or substitute a provision of the Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Act 1985 take effect; and
        (c) fix 1 July 2009 as the day on which sections 5 and 6 of the Water and Sewerage Industry (Consequential and Transitional) Act 2008 commence; and
        (d) fix 1 July 2009 as the day on which the provisions of Schedule 1 to the Water and Sewerage Industry (Consequential and Transitional) Act 2008 that insert, amend, repeal or substitute a provision of an Act other than the Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Act 1985 take effect; and
        (e) fix 1 October 2009 as the day on which section 4 , and Schedule 2 to, the Water and Sewerage Industry (Consequential and Transitional) Act 2008 commence.
15 June 2009

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 June 2009

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries and Water.
